text: Eti nepravednyye sbivayut drugikh lyudey s pryamogo puti Allakha - s puti very i dobrykh deyaniy, stavya pered nimi pregrady i iskazhaya religiyu, stremyas' iskrivit' put' istiny, chtoby lyudi otklonilis' ot nego. Eti nepravednyye ne veryat v Poslednyuyu obitel' i ne boyatsya nakazaniya Allakha
